first.sub-title-first: Established in 2001 with the slogan of Sincere and Accurate service,
first.sub-title-second: We are achieving substantial and deep growth not only as a freight forwarder but also as a Global Logistics Company.

home-introduction.title: Fast and Accurate Logistic Problem Solver
home-introduction.first: From a big foreign/domestic corportaions to small and medium-sized corporations, we are providing a total service of all the logistic process such as customs clearance, transportation, and warehouses.
home-introduction.second: Through experienced employees with diverse experience, we are fully prepared to meet and satisfy our clients' needs with accurate service and the best price. For our clients, we will become your employee to help reduce logistics-work resources with our know-hows and specialities.

about.title: About BNC Logistics
about.title-first: BNC aims to provide efficient and high quality service for clients since 2001. Starting with steel product, power cable drum and raw material, cargo kinds we are handling are keep expanding. Our clients are all time satisfied with our professional skills and competitive freights. We are confident of creating clients' satisfaction based on our accumulated know-hows, expertise and high quality service. BNC is keep maintaining and expanding business area with foreign/domestic major companies.
about.title-second: Our top priority is providing best quality service to our clients. Our policy always aims at achieving the highest level of customer satisfaction. In the futuer, we are fully sure that BNC Logistics will remain as a `trustworthy partner` to our clients.
about.title-third: Furthermore, We are developing various optimization IT solutions and also automating complex logistic process by cooperating and recruiting talented co-worker from major IT companies.

network.title: Broad Ocean Carriers Network
network.content-first: Not only BNC Logistics representative had experience from major ocean carrier company, but also other executives and employees are from various major general trading company. We have a network with all shipping carriers around the world so that we can support all possible schedules focused on our clients.
network.content-second: Furthermore we try hard to keep the networks with finding the best way to cooperate with ocean carrier managers. BNC promises to support the best service with a variety of schedules and reasonable quotes.

america.title: BNC AMERICA Corporation
america.content-first: In February 2024, a subsidiary of BNC Logistics' North America corporation, called BNC AMERICA, were established to develop logistic business across all over the North America, especially United States.
america.content-second: BNC America support not only ocean/air transportation but also various local logistic services such as trucking, customs clearance, shuttles, and storage in America continent.
america.content-third: BNC America actively cooperate with global network to support export/import from the United States with partners in 260 countries.
america.content-four: Through agile cooperation between Korea headquarter and America corporation, we are widely expanding our role as a Global Logistics Problem Solver.

first.title: Creative and Optimized Method Proposal
first.first: For the first time in Korea, BNC Logistics exported container transportation for steels and power cables. We creatively propose an export method that is suitable for the cargos by predicting various variables and effectiveness.
first.second: In addition, when the Gwangyang Port was launched, BNC actively took advantage of the new port and had honor to achieve the most largest volume carrier of the Gwangyang Port.
first.third: From the very first contact, clients will notice that our team ask a lot of questions. This is because our team is deeply interested in how to serve the most optimal and creative service. Through BNC's customized approach, we can make a real difference in your logistic processes.

second.title: Trade & Logistic Consulting and Education
second.first: We actively support consulting on trade/export/import throughout all the cargos classified as dangerous goods to all ordinary cargoes.
second.second: We also supports educations for our clients about basic trade and logistics. From new employees to experienced employees, anyone who is not familiar with the logistic field, we are willing to give our knowledges. We go on a business trip together to the Busan/Gwangyang Port, Terminal, CY so that our clients get more background knowledge about the industry.
second.third: We will support clients as much as possible to let them become a trade/logistics expert through cooperation with BNC Logistics.

third.title: Core Value
third.first: Success by Performance' is both a slogan and a key method. Constant investment and focus on Client Needs has brought us to where we are today and will continue to carry us into the future.
third.second: Teamwork is also a key. By trusting our employees and encourage collaboration, we give them the tools and resources they need for success. BNC people tend to stick around longer in BNC with our positive and efficient culture. We are doing our best to help our executives and employees grow as well as our company's growth, Our company deeply take care of our team culture and respect to each others.
third.third: We are fiscally responsible and believe that financial stability is the right of our clients and employees. Your cargo and our employees' right will never be at risk due to bad financial planning or reckless decisions. BNC Logistics is a family company operating for two generations. We work hard to keep the same family values and ethics that we have always had.

service.title: Services
service.service-title: Various Experience and Global Logistics Know-How
service.service-sub-title: We are keeping a partnership with all other countries to support our clients with all-in-one logistics services. Ocean & Air freight, Customs Clearance, Trucking, Storage, etc.. All services are available without any regional exceptions.

first.title: Ocean freight (Export, Import)
first.first: Together with carriers around the world, we provide the best service to deliver valuable cargos through various shipping methods such as LCL, FCL, BULK, ROO, and TANK SHIP to ensure safer, faster, and more accurate transportation to the final destination.
first.second: we will offer competitive logistic system through cooperation with long-time TOP service AGENTs in all regions of the world, and ensure that any cargo, such as valuable export/import cargo, LCL and FCL, and various types of project cargo, can be safely delivered to the final destination on time.

second.title: Air freight (Export, Import)
second.first: BNC has partnership with all the leading airlines and air freight agents around the world. We propose competitive fares with various options of schedules. Our professionals and partners provide rapid service so that your precious cargo can be safely transported from the departure point to the destination with accurate business processing.
second.second: We have organized a CFS warehouse and a transportation system including trucking at Incheon Airport's cargo terminal. We have established our own infrastructure from the storage and delivery of customs clearance and logistics warehouses. As a result, we can let our shippers feel convenient and satisfied.

third.title: Custom Clearing, Trucking, Warehouse-CFS
third.first: BNC Logistics offers wide variety type of services in order to help clients' import, export and customs clearances with updated customs regulations and procedures. We aim to provide the best quality service to clients that helps in avoding the delay in clearance and other detention. We also support various vehicles that needs to meet all clients' demand in the are of various industrial bulk cargos and containers. Moreover, we have a contract with Kuls CFS and Dongbu CFS. They have a whole team of experienced technical experts who provide complete and effective manner of service without unnecessary delays. Through these services our clients not only have more control over their goods without worrying about the warehousing process but can also minimize the inventory costs.

four.title: Bulk & Project
four.first: Heavy cargoes that cannot be loaded in 20'/40' containers or special-purpose containers such as vehicles, chemicals, and dangerous goods are loaded on bulk carriers and cab be transported safely.
four.second: We select the most appropriate transportation method for large and mass mechanical equipment cargo transportation. By providing all procedures of transportation as a one-stop service from start to finish, we respond quickly and accurately to any kind of transportation request our clients need.

five.title: Intermediary Trade
five.first: As a form of indirect trade which is a trade carried out by third countries intervening between exporting and importing countries.

content.j: I Agree to the Terms of the

policy.a: BNC Logistics Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as the 'Company') values your personal information and complies with the Act on Promotion of Information and Communication Network Utilization and Information Protection.
policy.b: The company uses the personal information provided by the client/customer through the personal information handling policy for what purpose and method,
policy.b-a: We would like to inform you of what methods are being taken to protect your personal information.
policy.c: Last changed date of personal information handling policy: 30th of November, 2023
policy.d: 1. Purpose and use of personal information collection
policy.e: The company is collecting minimal information to provide a website service.
policy.f: All users' personal information may never be used for any purpose other than those stated, but we will definitely seek consent from the members if the purpose and use of the members' personal information are changed.
policy.g: 2. Collected personal informations, retention, and duration of use
policy.h: 1) The information that the company collects to provide various services is as follows.
policy.i: ① Collections: Name, Contact, Email, Company Name
policy.j: ② Method of collecting personal information: online quote inquiry, website field trip application, prize event application, fair and other business activities
policy.k: (2) When the company collects the user's personal information, it must obtain the user's consent.
policy.l: (3) In principle, the company destroys the personal information without delay after the purpose of collecting and using it has been achieved. However, if it is necessary to preserve it in accordance with the provisions of the relevant laws and regulations, the company shall keep the member information for a certain period prescribed by the relevant laws and regulations as follows.
policy.m: However, if it is necessary to preserve it in accordance with the provisions of the relevant laws and regulations, the company shall keep the member information for a certain period prescribed by the relevant laws and regulations as follows.
policy.n: ① Retention Item: Name, Contact, Email, Company Name
policy.o: ② Following law: [Act on Promotion of Information and Communication Network Utilization and Protection of Personal Information - Republic of Korea]
policy.r: In principle, the company does not provide users' personal information to the outside world. However, exceptions are made in the following cases.
policy.s: ① If users have agreed in advance
policy.t: ② Where there is a request from an investigative agency in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations or in accordance with the procedures and methods prescribed by laws and regulations for the purpose of investigation
policy.u: ③ Utilization of minimum user information (name, contact) necessary for business related to providing client/customer service
policy.v: ④ Where a particular individual is provided in an unidentifiable form as necessary for statistical preparation, academic research or market research
policy.w: 4. Rights of users and legal representatives and how to exercise them
policy.x: ⅰ) The Company shall obtain the consent of its legal representative when collecting personal information of children under the age of 14.
policy.y: ⅱ) The Company shall take necessary measures without delay when users request correction of errors in personal information or request deletion.
policy.z: The company processes personal information canceled or deleted at the request of the user in accordance with the `Period of Retention and Use of Personal Information Collected by the Company` and prevents it from being viewed or used for any other purpose.
policy.aa: * How to request deletion: E-mail, Fax, Phone
policy.ac: The company does not entrust your information to an external company without your consent. If such a need arises in the future, we will notify you of the entrusted person and the entrusted work and obtain prior consent if necessary.
policy.ag: If you need to report or consult about other personal information infringement, please contact the following institution.
policy.aj: 3. Internet Crime Investigation Center of the Supreme Prosecutors' Office (http://icic.sppo.go.kr/+82-2-3480-3600 )
policy.ak: 4. Cyber Terrorism Response Center of the National Police Agency (www.ctrc.go.kr/+82-2-392-0330 )
